title: Blood Line
description: An American heiress sets off on a mystery journey after being given a warning by her angel.Teenage angst and lack of communication result in a hilarious romp in the Scottish Highlands.The Island of the Fairies features large - is it the scene of her wedding or is she to be sacrificed to fulfil an ancient rite - or both?Only her angel can help her, and he's trying hard, after all this is his first case. But will he rescue her, and if so how?A macabre Gothic comedy, this has shades of Northanger Abbey in the heroine's view of the adult world.
author: Kate Hamilton
